name: MTLAccelerationStructureMotionBoundingBoxGeometryDescriptor
desc: A description of a list of bounding boxes, as motion keyframe data, to turn into an acceleration structure.

items.name: var boundingBoxCount: Int
items.desc: The number of bounding boxes in each bounding box buffer.

items.name: var boundingBoxBuffers: [MTLMotionKeyframeData]
items.desc: A array of motion keyframes, each containing bounding box data.

items.name: var boundingBoxStride: Int
items.desc: The stride, in bytes, between bounding boxes in each buffer.
